title: Yale Model United Nations (YMUN) 2026
description: YMUN is one of the most selective and competitive high school MUN conferences in the world and is hosted by Yale students in New Haven. It is known for intense committee dynamics strong chairing and a serious awards culture. Delegations attend for both academic rigor and the credibility that comes with performing well on a top circuit conference.
format: Opening ceremonies -> Committee sessions -> Moderated and unmoderated caucus -> Draft resolution or crisis directives -> Voting procedure -> Closing and awards
eligibility: High school students typically Grades 9-12 registering via a school delegation or independent delegation as allowed
howToApply: 1. Review dates and deadlines. 2. Register as a delegation or independent group. 3. Pay fees if required. 4. Submit position papers by the stated deadline if applicable

title: Ivy League Model United Nations Conference (ILMUNC) 2026
description: ILMUNC is a major high school MUN conference hosted by the University of Pennsylvania and is widely seen as a core stop on the elite US circuit. Many teams treat it as a benchmark conference for awards performance and delegate development.
format: Opening ceremonies -> Committee sessions -> Topic briefings -> Resolution writing -> Debate and voting -> Closing and awards
eligibility: High school students typically Grades 9-12 attending through school delegations and approved independent delegations
howToApply: 1. Visit the conference schedule and registration pages. 2. Register your delegation. 3. Complete payment. 4. Submit required documents and position papers if requested
